title: Fullstack Developer
aboutParagraph: I am a Full Stack Developer from Kénitra, Morocco. With experience in developing innovative and user-friendly applications. I have successfully developed diverse projects ranging from administrative applications to user-centric platforms. With a solid understanding of software development, I am always willing to learn new technologies and expand my skill set. My passion for creating impactful solutions drives my commitment to overcome technical challenges.
hearingFromYou: I look forward to hearing from you!

courtProject.title: Management System
courtProject.description1: In my previous role as an intern in the IT department of
courtProject.description2: the Court of Appeal in Kénitra
courtProject.description3: , I was tasked with developing and launching a new web application deployed on the court's local network, managing the human resources and office equipment provided by the government to increase efficiency in workflow and assist in decision making.

thesesPlatformProject.title: Graduation Projects Management Platform
thesesPlatformProject.description1: For my graduation project, I developed a full-stack application. A platform that manages graduation projects of students of
thesesPlatformProject.description3: with user authentication and multiple permissions system, where the administrator, professors, and students can log in and access important information as well as perform various tasks.
